channel.title: How to add owner has just logged in
channel.description: so lets say the owner just logged in it would say owner______ has logged in can anyone give me a code or file to go to to edit this thanks

item.title: How to add owner has just logged in
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“DingDongDing, post:9, topic:446675”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=549567.msg4028623#msg4028623 date=1340554989]

Go to where logging in is handled. You may have to make the code work for Hybrid PVP

if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll("Owner + playerName + has logged in."); }
Hope I helped

wtf? ,xp

What?
[/quote]
Your one works better and is easyer than my lol[/quote]
I don’t use Hybrid Pvp or PI.
I don’t know how to make a server work with a 317 cache so I’m using Hybridscape. lol

Read full topic

item.title: How to add owner has just logged in
item.dc:creator: @DingDongDing DingDongDing
item.description:
@DingDongDing wrote:

Open client.java

Look for :

if (addStarter) getPA().addStarter();
Add under it:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("INGAME NAME")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=6081134>[OWNER] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } }

Read full topic
